S

setAlignmentMode(int) - Method in class android.support.v7.widget.GridLayout
Sets the alignment mode to be used for all of the alignments between the children of this container.
setColumnCount(int) - Method in class android.support.v7.widget.GridLayout
ColumnCount is used only to generate default column/column indices when they are not specified by a component's layout parameters.
setColumnOrderPreserved(boolean) - Method in class android.support.v7.widget.GridLayout
When this property is true, GridLayout is forced to place the column boundaries so that their associated grid indices are in ascending order in the view.
setGravity(int) - Method in class android.support.v7.widget.GridLayout.LayoutParams
Describes how the child views are positioned.
setOrientation(int) - Method in class android.support.v7.widget.GridLayout
Orientation is used only to generate default row/column indices when they are not specified by a component's layout parameters.
setRowCount(int) - Method in class android.support.v7.widget.GridLayout
RowCount is used only to generate default row/column indices when they are not specified by a component's layout parameters.
setRowOrderPreserved(boolean) - Method in class android.support.v7.widget.GridLayout
When this property is true, GridLayout is forced to place the row boundaries so that their associated grid indices are in ascending order in the view.
setUseDefaultMargins(boolean) - Method in class android.support.v7.widget.GridLayout
When true, GridLayout allocates default margins around children based on the child's visual characteristics.
Space - Class in android.support.v7.widget
Space is a lightweight View subclass that may be used to create gaps between components in general purpose layouts.
Space(Context, AttributeSet, int) - Constructor for class android.support.v7.widget.Space
Space(Context, AttributeSet) - Constructor for class android.support.v7.widget.Space
Space(Context) - Constructor for class android.support.v7.widget.Space
spec(int, int, GridLayout.Alignment) - Static method in class android.support.v7.widget.GridLayout
Return a Spec, spec, where: spec.span = [start, start + size] spec.alignment = alignment
spec(int, GridLayout.Alignment) - Static method in class android.support.v7.widget.GridLayout
Return a Spec, spec, where: spec.span = [start, start + 1] spec.alignment = alignment
spec(int, int) - Static method in class android.support.v7.widget.GridLayout
Return a Spec, spec, where: spec.span = [start, start + size]
spec(int) - Static method in class android.support.v7.widget.GridLayout
Return a Spec, spec, where: spec.span = [start, start + 1]
START - Static variable in class android.support.v7.widget.GridLayout
Indicates that a view should be aligned with the start edges of the other views in its cell group.
